author: PlayStation
description:
Your Mission: Eliminate Your Mentor.
 
METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER will be released on August 28, 2025 - Pre-Order Now!
 
METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER is a remake of the 2004 game METAL GEAR SOLID 3: SNAKE EATER.
 
The remake maintains what players loved from the original: story, characters, voice acting, gameplay and music presented now in an even more immersive experience.
 
©Konami Digital Entertainment
 
#ps5 #ps5games #MetalGearSolid #MGSDelta #MGSΔ #MGS3 #SnakeEater
title: Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

GRIT AND VALOR – 1949 is now on PS5!
The war for Europe is in your hands.
Take command in a dieselpunk tactical roguelite where mechs dominate 
the battlefield, your team evolves with every mission, and the Axis war 
machine must be crushed once and for all. Upgrade your squad, outthink 
the enemy, and liberate Europe!

Get it now on PlayStation 5! https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012427

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013966

Herdling stampedes onto PlayStation 5 on August 21, 2025.

Head out on a grand alpine expedition with a herd of loveable beasts, as you ascend a mountain path, encounter eerie dangers and surprising obstacles, and forge your way to the mystery at the summit. Guide a herd of mysterious creatures on a stirring and beautiful journey into the mountains… and beyond.

Herdling is a brand new adventure from Okomotive, creators of the atmospheric and acclaimed FAR games, and Panic, publishers of Firewatch.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Herdling - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EP4293-PPSA21990_00-DISCOUNTYSIEEPS5

BREAKING NEWS: Tensions Rise in Blomkest as Discounty Recently Opened Its Doors
 
Reports are coming in from the harbour town of Blomkest, where Discounty recently opened its doors under new management...you! 
 
Residents have been spotted picketing outside the supermarket, citing questionable ownership, aggressive expansion plans and an unexplained surplus of frozen French Fries.
 
Discounty is open for business and available digitally on PlayStation 4 & 5
 
Shoppers are advised to expect quirky trade deals and high levels of small-town drama. Local authorities recommend keeping the floors clean, the checkout queues short and secrets quieter than the town gossip.

The physical editions are also available for PlayStation 5. 

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Discounty - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

The Demon. The Starchild. The Spaceman. The Catman. We wanted the best, and we got the best. KISS takes the stage in World of Tanks Modern Armor’s METAL FEST! 

New tanks, new 3D Commanders, new Challenges and events: they’re all part of what Metal Fest offers each summer. Don’t miss any of it—Metal Fest takes place from August 26 through September 15 on PlayStation!
